page.title: 20EDUCATION AT AVERHAM SCHOOL
page.content: Averham,The Manners Sutton is a County Primary School.Staffing consists of 1 Headteacher,1 Fulltime Teacher,3 Part time Teachers,a Caretaker,a Secretary and 2 Kitchen Staff.There are 33 children on roll. Admission arrangements for pupils are :-each child is admitted the term when he or she is 5.Parents considering sending their child to school can visit the school beforehand. In the organisation of Education there are 2 classes.The Infant Class is 5/7 yrs.The Junior Class is 7/11 yrs.The subjects taught are:-Reading,Writing, Arithmetic,Religious Education, Science,Computers,Environmental Studies,Physical Education,Art and Craft,Music and Cookery.The Junior children are also involved in the sports of Netball,Football,Rounders, Cricket and Hockey.
